title-three: “Stamp & Win” - Experiencing the Innovative Dynamic Mixed Margin on BSC
title-frou: Time: From July 12th 10:00 AM to July 20th 10:00 AM UTC
rules-one: Minimum wallet balance requirement: more than 0.2 BNB at July 11th, 10:00 AM UTC
rules-two: This promotion does not apply to any addresses interacted with Deri Protocol Smart before July 12th 10:00 AM, 2021
step-one: Step 1: Click the stamp button three times. Notably, the stamp button can only be clicked once a day
step-two: Step 2: Claim the designated Ptoken (Deri Position Token) including 1.5 BUSD Initial Margin, one BTCUSD/BUSD contract, and one ETHUSD/BUSD contract by clicking the claim button
step-three: Step 3: Use the Ptoken airdropped to complete at least three trading transactions
description: All addresses which complete the above steps during the event period will equally share a prize pool of $100,000 in DERI
